                                                     java.lang.String sourceBranch,
                                                     java.lang.String targetBranch,
                                                     java.lang.String lastRevision)
                                                       throws ScmException
        Returns a list of change sets from a given repository, committed to a given branch, that are not merged to it's parent. The first item is the last common revision of the repository with its upstream repository on that branch. If lastRevision is specified then only commits until that revision are returned.

        sourceBranch -
        targetBranch -
        lastRevision -
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the passed branch or revision does not exist in the passed repository, or if the passed revision is not on the passed branch.

      • getAvailableRepositoryTypes

        public java.util.LinkedHashMap<ScmRepositoryType,org.springframework.binding.message.MessageResolver> getAvailableRepositoryTypes()
        Get the available repository types. Returns a map with keys as the ScmRepositoryTypes. f the value is null that means that the repository is available. if the value is not null then that is the message describes why this type is not available.
        Returns:
        Map of ScmRepositoryTypes with the reason why that is NOT available
